# SPARSE_NORM_INF

**Global Variable**

Norm Inf

## Declaration

```swift
var SPARSE_NORM_INF: sparse_norm { get }
```

## Discussion

| Matrix element wise | *maxᵢ,ⱼ ( | A[i,j] | )*__ | |—|—| | Matrix operator | *maxᵢ ( sumⱼ ( | A[i,j] | )*__ | | Vector element wise | *maxᵢ ( | x[i] | )*__ |

## Constants

- **SPARSE_NORM_ONE**: Norm One
- **SPARSE_NORM_TWO**: Norm Two
- **SPARSE_NORM_R1**: Norm R1
